document.full_text: prime minister benjamin netanyahu said on wednesday that a palestinian man from gaza held by israel after what relatives called an overseas abduction was a hamas member who had given "valuable information."
document.title: netanyahu confirms gaza man held by israel
lines_and_colors: prime minister benjamin netanyahu said on wednesday that a palestinian man from gaza held by israel after what relatives called an overseas abduction was a hamas member who had given "valuable information."
